comments:
This is probably not the right place to report this bug, but can't find the right area, just hopping that somebody involved in IBM CMVC plug-in will see it

getting the following exception using the CMVC plugin on linux with eclipse 3.2.1

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-02-10 10:08:24.461
!MESSAGE com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.CheckoutAction tried to access field org/eclipse/team/internal/ui/actions/TeamAction.shell from class
!STACK 0
java.lang.IllegalAccessError: com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.CheckoutAction tried to access field org/eclipse/team/internal/ui/actions/TeamAction.shell from class
        at com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.CheckoutAction.performAction(CheckoutAction.java:39)
        at com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.WorkspaceFileAction.executeActionForProject(WorkspaceFileAction.java:298)
        at com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.WorkspaceFileAction.run(WorkspaceFileAction.java:171)
        at org.eclipse.ui.actions.ActionDelegate.runWithEvent(ActionDelegate.java:70)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.PluginAction.runWithEvent(PluginAction.java:244)
        at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:539)
        at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$2(ActionContributionItem.java:488)
        at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem$5.handleEvent(ActionContributionItem.java:400)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java(Compiled Code))
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java(Inlined Compiled Code))
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java(Compiled Code))
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java(Compiled Code))
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java(Compiled Code))
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runUI(Workbench.java:1878)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.createAndRunWorkbench(Workbench.java:419)
        at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:149)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.IDEApplication.run(IDEApplication.java:95)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.PlatformActivator$1.run(PlatformActivator.java:78)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.internal.adaptor.EclipseAppLauncher.runApplication(EclipseAppLauncher.java:92)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.internal.adaptor.EclipseAppLauncher.start(EclipseAppLauncher.java:68)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:400)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run(EclipseStarter.java:177)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:85)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:58)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:60)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:391)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:336)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:280)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:977)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:952)

from there it looks like the plugin is trying to access private .shell directly instead of using getShell()... but I don't have access to the source code to confirm or to fix it myself.

I had same plugin running on windows over eclispe 3.0.x so easy conclusion is the .shell became private within the past year?
Not having much hope to fix this, looks like the IBM internal repository did not have any update since Dec 2005 so most likely the link is dead :-(
But if anybody from IBM development crew sees this, please look me up on blue pages and contact me... I don't mind fixing the sources if I could get access to it.
Please contact an IBM support team regarding your questions as this is a product issue. Thank you.

traces.message: com.ibm.sdwb.cmvc.client.eclipse.team.ui.actions.CheckoutAction tried to access field org/eclipse/team/internal/ui/actions/TeamAction.shell from class
